About.about_info:
Motorcare has been providing automotive services to businesses in Mozambique since 1996.
As an authorized distributor of premium brands, Motorcare delivers excellent automotive solutions, including genuine parts and accessories, as well as specialized maintenance and repair services, complemented by a full range of fleet management solutions.
Motorcare's national presence extends to the cities of Maputo, Beira, Nampula, Pemba, and Moatize.
Motorcare aims to grow its business profitably and responsibly, promoting social and environmental goals aligned with international standards and certifications.
About.mission_description:
Create a high-performance environment where the contributions of employees, customers, and business partners are valued and respected.
Develop a portfolio of innovative brands and services that outperforms the competition and delivers the greatest possible value in how we work.
About.vision_description: Provide pioneering automotive solutions in emerging economies.
About.values_description1:
Professionalism
We act with rigor and competence in everything we do — this is how we conduct our business and interact with each other.
About.values_description2:
Respect
Mutual respect between colleagues, partners, customers, and all stakeholders is a fundamental principle for us.
About.values_description3:
Honesty
We handle all business matters with maximum transparency. We are trustworthy and honor our promises and commitments.
About.values_description4:
Dedication
We believe that the success of our customers and partners is essential to our own success.
About.nissan: As an authorized Nissan vehicle dealership, MOTORCARE offers top automotive solutions, genuine parts, accessories, as well as access to after-sales services like preventive and corrective maintenance. We offer solutions for both B2B and B2C segments.
About.renault: Renault Trucks has been distributed in Mozambique by Motorcare since 2014. It offers innovative vehicles adapted to a wide range of transport activities: distribution, construction, heavy construction, long distance.
About.niu: NIU is a global leader in smart urban mobility solutions. Instead of waiting for the market to demand a green shift, Motorcare offers zero-emission mobility solutions.
About.continental: Continental produces safe, efficient, and performance-oriented tires for passenger cars, commercial vehicles, and two-wheelers. It is a leading global tire technology and manufacturing company, offering a wide range of products suitable for various conditions and applications.
About.general: General Tire, part of the Continental Group, offers products you can rely on for everyday adventures at affordable prices.
About.maxxis: Maxxis is a brand committed to providing high-quality tires at affordable prices. Its range includes tires for motorcycles, cars, vans, trucks, agricultural vehicles, and more — all with exceptional quality.
About.cst: Cheng Shin Tire is the world's largest manufacturer of bicycle and motorcycle tires. It is part of the Maxxis group, and its product line includes tires and inner tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, ATVs, cars, trucks, forklifts, agricultural, and gardening equipment.
About.history_info: MOTORCARE Mozambique was founded in 1996 by the KJAER GROUP, a Danish company that provides transport solutions in over 70 countries. Motorcare Mozambique's passion and commitment to delivering high-quality transportation and complete vehicle solutions have solidified its position in the emerging transportation market. We are present in Maputo, Beira, Nampula, Moatize, and Pemba.
About.1996: Start of operations in Mozambique - Matola.
About.2008: Opening of Beira and Nampula branches.
About.2014: Opening of Moatize and Pemba facilities.
About.2023: Restructuring of Maputo, Beira, and Nampula branches.
About.certification_info: Motorcare provides services and products in accordance with international standards for health, safety, environment, and quality. Therefore, it has an Integrated Management System based on three international standards: ISO 45001 (Health & Safety), ISO 14001 (Environment), and ISO 9001 (Quality), which are audited annually both internally and externally by an international body. ISO 14001 is an international standard that allows companies to demonstrate their commitment to environmental protection by managing the environmental risks associated with their activities. ISO 9001 aims to ensure greater quality in product or service delivery, focusing on the company’s strategic management. This enables improved operational efficiency and Customer Satisfaction.

Request.service_content:
At Motorcare, providing maintenance services — whether preventive or corrective — is a top priority. Our modern workshops are equipped to handle large volumes of vehicles efficiently and with quality.
You can count on us for competent and transparent service — that’s how we do business and take care of our customers.
Book your service with us and ensure the best care for your vehicle.
Request.test_drive_content:
Want to try the vehicle before deciding?
Fill out the form and book your test drive with us.
Request.peaces_content:
Motorcare is committed to maximum customer satisfaction, which is why we work exclusively with genuine parts, certified by the manufacturer (OEM) and backed by ISO 9001 certification issued by Bureau Veritas.
In addition to parts, we offer a wide range of vehicle accessories, ensuring quality, durability, and full compatibility.
Our commitment is to always provide reliable solutions that guarantee the best performance and safety for your vehicle.
Request.name: Name
Request.location: Where would you like to do the test drive?
Request.car_damage: Has the vehicle been in any kind of accident?

Whistleblowing.description: KJAER GROUP is committed to conducting business with integrity and doing what is right for our customers, colleagues, and society. We encourage everyone who has serious concerns that they wish to report to use our Whistleblowing System, where they can report confidentially and anonymously, if they wish.
